                               Table 13 — Error correction characteristics for versions 1 to 6
                                                                                     Number of       Error correction
             Version              Total            Error           Number of
                                                                                                     code per block a
                                                                                  error correction
                               number of        correction            error
                                                                                        blocks
                              codewords            level           correction
                                                                   codewords
                                                                                                         (26,19,2) b
                 1                 26                L                  7                  1
                                                                                                         (26,16,4) b
                                                     M                 10                  1
                                                                                                         (26,13,6) b
                                                     Q                 13                  1
                                                                                                          (26,9,8) b
                                                     H                 17                  1
                                                                                                         (44,34,4) b
                 2                 44                L                 10                  1
                                                     M                 16                  1              (44,28,8)
                                                     Q                 22                  1             (44,22,11)
                                                     H                 28                  1             (44,16,14)
                                                                                                         (70,55,7) b
                 3                 70                L                 15                  1
                                                     M                 26                  1             (70,44,13)
                                                     Q                 36                  2              (35,17,9)
                                                     H                 44                  2             (35,13,11)
                 4                100                L                 20                  1            (100,80,10)
                                                     M                 36                  2              (50,32,9)
                                                     Q                 52                  2             (50,24,13)
                                                     H                 64                  4               (25,9,8)
                 5                134                L                 26                  1           (134,108,13)
                                                     M                 48                  2             (67,43,12)
                                                     Q                 72                  2              (33,15,9)
                                                                                           2              (34,16,9)
                                                     H                 88                  2             (33,11,11)
                                                                                           2             (34,12,11)
                 6                172                L                 36                  2              (86,68,9)
                                                     M                 64                  4              (43,27,8)
                                                     Q                 96                  4             (43,19,12)
                                                     H                112                  4             (43,15,14)
           a    (c, k, r): c = total number of codewords
                             k = number of data codewords
                             r = number of error correction capacity
           b    Error correction capacity is less than half the number of error correction codewords to reduce the
           probability of misdecodes.

                                         ISO Store order #:762844/Downloaded:2006-08-01
